headline: Trump’s Carefully Scripted Week Kept Veering Off Script
description: Despite calls by his advisers to focus on the issues, Donald Trump has made it clear that he intends to keep running his campaign his way.

headline: New Training and Tougher Rules: How Colleges Are Trying to Tame Gaza Protests
description: University officials are spelling out strict codes around protests. They say they are trying to be clear. Others say they are trying to suppress speech.

headline: Why Mpox Vaccines Aren’t Flowing to Africans in Desperate Need
description: Drugmakers have supplies ready to ship that are necessary to stop a potential pandemic. But W.H.O. regulations have slowed access.
